sentences.sentence: Damned! You unpatriotic flunky, get ready for your death!
sentences.translation: 可恶，你这不顾民族大义的小人，准备受死吧！

sentences.sentence: Last summer she issued an apology after a speech in which she criticised America for seeming to give the finger to the world, something deemed unpatriotic by some of her adopted countrymen.
sentences.translation: 去年夏天，她对于自己批评美国似乎是在对全世界竖中指一事做出道歉，她的批评被她的某些“同胞”们视为辱国。
